## IBox.get() method

Gets the value of the Box.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
get(): V;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

V

## Remarks

Usages of `get()` aren't tracked, they are only for retrieving the value. To track changes, you need to create a derivation.
